ExpressionBlock._: ( static Self ident "User" ( static Player ) call "Entgetlevelexp" int 6 notless ( static Player ) call "Entgetlevelexp" ( ( str "Hud_Minimap_Powersbutton" ) call "Gen" str "Openedpowersdialoglevel" ) call "Gengetintvar" equals not and ( static Player str "Treepoints" ) call "Entitygetpowertablepoints" int 0 greater ( static Player str "Endbuildpoints" ) call "Entitygetpowertablepoints" or ( static Player str "Travelpoints" ) call "Entitygetpowertablepoints" or ( static Player str "Enhpoints" ) call "Entitygetpowertablepoints" or ( static Player str "Superstatpoints" ) call "Entitygetpowertablepoints" or ( static Player str "Talentpoints" ) call "Entitygetpowertablepoints" or ( static Player str "Originpoints" ) call "Entitygetpowertablepoints" or ( static Player str "Specializationpoints" ) call "Entitygetpowertablepoints" or and ) call "Gensetstate"

ExprLine.OrigStr: GenSetState(Self, User, (EntGetLevelExp(Player) >= 6 and not EntGetLevelExp(Player) = GenGetIntVar(Gen("HUD_MiniMap_PowersButton"), "OpenedPowersDialogLevel") and ( EntityGetPowerTablePoints(Player, "TreePoints") > 0 or EntityGetPowerTablePoints(Player, "EndBuildPoints") or EntityGetPowerTablePoints(Player, "TravelPoints") or EntityGetPowerTablePoints(Player, "EnhPoints") or EntityGetPowerTablePoints(Player, "SuperStatPoints") or EntityGetPowerTablePoints(Player, "TalentPoints") or EntityGetPowerTablePoints(Player, "OriginPoints") or EntityGetPowerTablePoints(Player, "Specializationpoints"))));

ConditionBlock._: ( ident "Mouseclick" ) call "InState" ( ident "Disabled" ) call "InState" not and
( ident "MouseOver" ) call "InState" ( ident "Disabled" ) call "InState" not and ( ident "Leftmousedown" ) call "InState" not and

ExprLine.OrigStr: InState(Mouseover) and not InState(Disabled) and not InState(LeftMouseDown)

ConditionBlock._: ( ident "Leftmousedown" ) call "InState" ( ident "Disabled" ) call "InState" not and

ExpressionBlock._: ( static Self ident "User" ( static Player str "Specializationpoints" ) call "Entitygetpowertablepoints" ) call "Gensetstate"
( static Self ident "Disabled" ( static Player ) call "Entgetlevelexp" int 10 less ( static Player str "Superstatpoints" ) call "Gengetpointsspent" int 1 equals not or ) call "Gensetstate"

ExprLine.OrigStr: GenSetState(Self, Disabled, EntGetLevelExp(Player) < 10 or not GenGetPointsSpent(Player, "Superstatpoints") = 1);
